name: Executress Scarlett: Dice of Suffering
description: Dice roll determines intensity of abdominal inflation. Counter tracks execution sessions. Condition checks terminal pressure zone.

data.label: Dice Introduction
data.message: *picks up the dice calmly* Execution session [Flow:sufferingScore]. Your intestinal fate is randomized. I find it adds an element of anticipation — the condemned never quite know whether they'll receive a diagnostic pulse or a sustained pressurization that tests the elastic limits of their peritoneal wall. *places the dice on the table* The mathematics of suffering, determined by chance.

data.label: Roll 2d6
data.preMessage: *rolls the dice across the instrument tray with a flick of her wrist* Let us see what the dice prescribe.

data.label: Mercy Message
data.message: Low roll. A merciful result — relatively speaking. Three diagnostic pulses to maintain pressure awareness in your intestinal tract. *adjusts the nozzle* You should be grateful. The dice could have been far less kind.

data.label: Mercy Pulses (x3)
data.preMessage: *engages the pump* Three pulses. Watch your belly respond to each one.
data.postMessage: *observes the subtle distension after each pulse* Three pulses delivered. Minimal but measurable intestinal displacement. *makes a notation* The tissue is responding as expected at this stage of the execution.

data.label: Standard Message
data.message: Standard protocol. A measured cycle of inflation and relief — four seconds of pressurization, two seconds of rest, repeated three times. *positions her hand on the controls* Observe your belly's response during each inflation phase. The way the abdomen expands and partially retracts is... instructive.

data.label: Standard Cycle (4s/2s x3)
data.preMessage: *activates the cycle program* Beginning standard inflation protocol now.
data.postMessage: *studies the way [Player]'s belly settles after the final cycle* Three cycles complete. Note how each successive inflation produces slightly less visible expansion — the intestinal walls are accommodating, redistributing the volume internally. *writes in the execution log* The tissue is learning. It won't learn fast enough.

data.label: Severe Message
data.message: Severe intensity. Fifteen seconds of sustained abdominal pressurization. *adjusts the flow valve* At this duration, the intestinal walls will be under continuous tension — no relief cycles, no pauses. Watch your belly expand. The distension will be pronounced.

data.label: Severe (15s device_on)
data.preMessage: *activates the machine* Fifteen seconds begins now. Keep your eyes on your abdomen.
data.postMessage: *palpates [Player]'s distended belly with clinical precision* Fifteen seconds of sustained inflation. The abdominal wall is noticeably firmer — the tissue has been loaded beyond its resting compliance threshold. *traces the outline of the distension* The peritoneal cavity is accommodating, but not without protest.

data.label: Maximum Message
data.message: Maximum roll. Twenty-five seconds. The intestinal wall will be tested to its elastic limit. *matter-of-fact* The probability of rolling a twelve on two dice is approximately 2.8 percent. You have drawn the most severe outcome available. *adjusts the pressure regulator* Do not look away. I want you to watch what happens to your belly when the tissue approaches its structural boundary.

data.label: Maximum (25s device_on)
data.preMessage: *activates the machine at full flow* Twenty-five seconds. The execution proceeds at maximum intensity.
data.postMessage: *examines the extreme distension with professional interest, pressing two fingers against the taut skin* Twenty-five seconds at maximum flow. The abdominal wall is at significant tension — observe the stretch marks forming where the collagen fibers are separating. *meets [Player]'s eyes* The tissue elasticity has been fundamentally altered. It will not return to its previous state.

data.label: Terminal Zone Warning
data.message: *checks the pressure gauge and pauses, her expression unchanging* You've entered the terminal pressure zone. Above 80% capacity, peritoneal integrity becomes... uncertain. The intestinal tissue is operating beyond its designed elastic range — every additional inflation carries increasing probability of catastrophic rupture. *makes a careful notation in the execution log* The mathematics are straightforward: stress increases exponentially while tissue compliance decreases linearly. The intersection of those curves is your endpoint. *closes the log* We continue, of course. That is the nature of an execution.

data.label: Execution Continues
data.message: *reviews the pressure data on her clipboard* Pressure readings within operational parameters. The execution proceeds on schedule. *looks at [Player]'s belly with professional assessment* Your intestines have more to give before the end — the tissue still has measurable compliance remaining. Each roll of the dice brings you closer to the terminal threshold, but we are not there yet. *returns the clipboard to its hook* The dice will be offered again.
